TopicTitle: Game breaking Kraken on liftoff - Solar panels spawning insaide craft, please help!

Articles.Content:
I'm running several mods including RSS, but with no problems until yesterday when all my rockets began drastically exploding without warning about 10 seconds after liftoff. My satellites have also begun shaking violently when coming out of timewarp, to see a single solar panel emerging from within the craft?! It's a specific single solar panel from AIES mod that appears to be spawning randomly inside my rockets and satellites. When it does so during takeoff the craft explodes and the flight log says I collided with 'node'. The panels that spawn aren't recognized as their part but still have the physical collisions associated with it consiquently shaking my crafts to bits :/

If anyone has had a similar problem and can shed some light it would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

My satellites have also begun shaking violently when coming out of timewarp, to see a single solar panel emerging from within the craft?! It's a specific single solar panel from AIES mod that appears to be spawning randomly inside my rockets and satellites. When it does so during takeoff the craft explodes and the flight log says I collided with 'node'. The panels that spawn aren't recognized as their part but still have the physical collisions associated with it consiquently shaking my crafts to bits :/

If anyone has had a similar problem and can shed some light it would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

EDIT: OK found the source, it stems from the Distant Object Enhancement v1.2 mod, after removing the problem subsided. It's almost certainly a compatibility issue between itself and another mod I have installed. But if you're getting this problem try removing this mod.
